Articles.Content:
Hey everyone

I have had KSP for a while now, will post some of my creations including a biplane and crazy stuff when the forum lets me.

P.S. I am a music producer/composer, you can check out my youtube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/user/JTMilneOFFICIAL
You have some talent. I watched a couple of your videos, and I like the music. I also wanna see your crazy stuff:D.
Welcome to the forums! We'll be looking forward to seeing what you've been working on.

Welcome to the forums!

I love all aeeing everyone's wacky airplane style contraptions. Hope to see your soon!

I am brandnewbieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ and was skimming the new members intros to get a feel for the memberships nuances etc, kind of like coming to a new poker game table (a friendly game) and sizing up the players as to what to do and not to do, ha ha ~ eh? A nice intro yours, hope to see you in the forums!

Ec ;

Ps.....(I always sign my replies our of habit, I am not stuck up etc....um, maybe a bit

reluctantly prideful, maybe but I am working on that one!, again welcome to the forums and hope to see you and everyone else soon!)
